action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. The shapes include red, purple, yellow, and orange pieces, each forming a distinct pattern. The shapes are scattered across the image without touching each other.

The shapes include red, purple, yellow, and orange pieces, each consisting of four squares arranged in various configurations. The shapes are scattered across the image without touching each other.
